name: Monero GUI landing page concept
description:
Concept design for a new landing page for the Monero GUI wallet. The current landing page (https://web.getmonero.org/downloads/), is a big list of all available downloads, but doesn't explain or show the wallet features. This landing page takes the opposite approach and explains primary features and different use cases.

This is a concept and would need to be refined before development (visuals, copy, navigation, etc).
